        --> pde index:0x7  pde contents:(valid 1, pfn 0x3d)

pde index: 0x19 pde contentes:(valid 0 , pt 0x7f)

Fault (page directory entry not valid)

计25 矣晓沅

计24 陈辉

田家申

杨植麟


PDE_BASE = 0xd80

def read_storage(filename):
    mem = []
    for line in open(filename):
        inputs = line.strip().split(':')[1].strip().split()
        for cont in inputs: mem.append(int(cont, 16))
    return mem

def get_cont(base, index, mem):
    return mem[base + index]

def handle_virtual(va):
    print 'Virtual Address 0x%x:' %va

    mem = read_storage('memory.in')
    disk = read_storage('disk.in')

    pde_index = (va & 0x7c00) >> 10
    pte_index = (va & 0x3e0) >> 5
    offset = va & 0x1f

    pde_content = get_cont(PDE_BASE, pde_index, mem)
    pde_valid = pde_content >> 7
    pte_base = pde_content - (pde_valid << 7)

    print '\t--> pde index: 0x%x pde contents: (valid 0x%x, pfn 0x%x)' % (pde_index, pde_valid, pte_base)

    if not pde_valid:
        print '\t\t--> Fault (page directory entry not valid)'
        return

    pte_content = get_cont(pte_base << 5, pte_index, mem)
    pte_valid = pte_content >> 7
    phys_base = pte_content - (pte_valid << 7)

    print '\t\t--> pte index: 0x%x pte contents: (valid 0x%x, pfn 0x%x)' % (pte_index, pte_valid, phys_base)

    if not pte_valid:
        if phys_base != 0x7f:
            disk_content = get_cont(phys_base << 5, offset, disk)
            print '\t\t\t--> Translated to Disk Address 0x%x --> Value 0x%x' % ((phys_base << 5) + offset, disk_content)
        else:
            print '\t\t\t -> Fault (page table entry not valid)'
        return

    phys_content = get_cont(phys_base << 5, offset, mem)
    print '\t\t\t--> Translated to Physical Address 0x%x --> Value: 0x%x' % ((phys_base << 5) + offset, phys_content)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    for line in open('request.in'):
        handle_virtual(int(line.strip().split()[2], 16))

输出：

			--> Translated to Physical Address 0xed3 --> Value: 0x12

Virtual Address 0xaf6:

		--> pte index: 0x13 pte contents: (valid 0x0, pfn 0x16)
			--> Translated to Disk Address 0x2cf --> Value 0x1c
优秀回答。

1c13: 12(page)

6809: 一级页表跪

0af6: 03(disk)

1e6f: 1c(disk)

f = open("0413_data.txt", "r")
data = {line.split(":")[0] : line.split(":")[1].split() for line in f.readlines()}

btoi = lambda x: int(x, 2)

def itob(i):
    b = bin(i)[2:]
    b = '0' * (8 - len(b)) + b
    return b


def htob(b):
    return itob(int(b, 16))


def btoh(b):
    h = hex(int(b, 2))[2:]
    h = '0' * (2 - len(h)) + h
    return h


def split_address(x):
    b = bin(int(x, 16))[2:]
    b = '0' * (16 - len(b)) + b
    b = b[1:]
    return [b[0:5], b[5:10], b[10:15]]


def analyse(x):
    i1, i2, offset = map(btoi, split_address(x))

    pdbr = "page 6c"
    pde_content = htob(data[pdbr][i1])

    print "PDE", pde_content
    if pde_content[0] != '1':
        print "INVALID PDE"
        return None

    pfn = btoh(pde_content[1:])
    pte_content = htob(data["page " + pfn][i2])

    print "PTE", pte_content
    pfn = btoh(pte_content[1:])
    
    if pte_content[0] == '1':
        base = "page "
    else:
        base = "disk "

    v = data[base + pfn][offset]
    return v


if __name__ == "__main__":
    while True:
        s = raw_input("V ADD >> ")
        print analyse(s)

代码如下：

#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<bitset>
using namespace std;
unsigned int mypdbr[32];
int main()
{
mypdbr[0]=0xe1;
mypdbr[1]=0xb5;
mypdbr[2]=0xa1;
mypdbr[3]=0xc1;
mypdbr[4]=0xb3;
mypdbr[5]=0xe4;
mypdbr[6]=0xa6;
mypdbr[7]=0xbd;
for(int i=8; i<32; i++)
mypdbr[i]=0x7f;

unsigned int pde_index, pde_context, pfn, pte_index, pte_contents;
unsigned int offset;
unsigned int value;

unsigned int va;// = 0x0330;

scanf("%08x",&va);

pde_index = (va&0x07c00) >> 10;
pte_index = (va&0x03e0) >> 5;
offset = (va&0x01f);

pde_context = mypdbr[pde_index];
pfn = pde_context&0x07f;
value = (mypdbr[pde_index]&0x080) >> 7;

printf("pde_index:0x%08x pde_context:0x%08x pfn:0x%08x ",pde_index,pde_context,pfn);
cout << "value:" << value << endl;

printf(" pte_index:0x%08x offset:0x%08x ",pte_index,offset);

scanf("%08x",&pte_contents);
//pte_contents = 0xe3;
unsigned int value2 = (pte_contents&0x080)>>7;
unsigned int pfn2 = pte_contents&0x7f;
unsigned int pa = (pfn2<<5)+offset;

printf("pte_contents:0x%08x value2:%d pfn2:0x%08x pa:0x%08x ",pte_contents,value2,pfn2,pa);

return 0;
}

memory = list()
disk = list()

# read two files respectively
f = open('page_data', 'r')

raw_line = f.readline()
while(raw_line):
    raw_line = (raw_line[9:]).strip()
    memory.extend(raw_line.split(' '))
    raw_line = f.readline()

f = open('disk_data', 'r')

raw_line = f.readline()
while(raw_line):
    raw_line = (raw_line[9:]).strip()
    disk.extend(raw_line.split(' '))
    raw_line = f.readline()

# print 'memory: ', len(memory)
# print 'disk: ', len(disk)

PD_BASE = 0xd80

def va2pa(VA):
    print 'Virtual Address ', hex(VA)

    m1 = 0b0111110000000000
    m2 = 0b0000001111100000
    m3 = 0b0000000000011111
    p1 = (m1 & VA) >> 10
    p2 = (m2 & VA) >> 5
    offset = m3 & VA

    pde_index = PD_BASE + p1
    valid = (int(memory[pde_index], 16) & 0b10000000) >> 7
    pfn = int(memory[pde_index], 16) & 0b01111111
    print '\tpde index: ', hex(pde_index), ' pde content: (valid ', valid, ', pfn ', hex(pfn), ') '
    if valid == 0:
        print '\t\t--> Fault (page directory entry not valid)'
        return

    pte_index = (pfn << 5) + p2
    valid = (int(memory[pte_index], 16) & 0b10000000) >> 7
    pfn = int(memory[pte_index], 16) & 0b01111111
    print '\t\tpte index: ', hex(pte_index), ' pte content: (valid ', valid, ', pfn ', hex(pfn), ') '
    if valid == 0:
        # print '\t\t\t--> Fault (page table entry not valid)'
        addr = (pfn << 5) + offset
        print '\t\t\t--> To Disk Sector Address ', addr, ' --> Value: ', disk[addr]
        return

    pa = (pfn << 5) + offset
    print '\t\t\t--> Translates to Physical Address ', hex(pa), ' --> Value: ', memory[pa]

va_list = [0x6653, 0x1c13, 0x6890, 0x0af6, 0x1e6f]

for va in va_list:
    va2pa(va)

梁錫豪 2012011290


def read_mem(fname):
fobj = open(fname, 'r')
mem = []
text = []
for line in fobj:
text.append(line[0:len(line) - 1])
line = line.split(':')[1].split(' ')
del line[len(line) - 1], line[0]
for i in range(len(line)):
line[i] = int(line[i], 16)
mem.append(line)
print mem[0]
return mem, text

def page_num(addr):
return addr >> 5

def print_hex(num):
print '0x%08x'%num

if __name__ == '__main__':
disk, disk_text = read_mem('disk.txt')
mem, mem_text = read_mem('mem.txt')
pdbr = 0xd80
pnum = page_num(pdbr)
print_hex(pnum)

vas = [0x0330, 0x1e6f]
for va in vas:
print 'Virtual Address %04x(%s):'%(va, bin(va))

pde = (va >> 10) & 0b11111
pde_content = mem[pnum][pde]
valid = pde_content >> 7 & 0b01
pfn = pde_content & 0b01111111
print (
' --> pde index:0x%08x pde contents:('
'0x%02x, %s, valid %d, pfn 0x%02x)'%
(
pde, pde_content, bin(pde_content), valid, pfn
)
)
print ' ' + mem_text[pnum]
print ' ' + mem_text[pfn]


if valid == 0:
continue

pte = (va >> 5) & 0b11111
pte_content = mem[pfn][pte]
print 'pte contents:0x%08x'%(pte_content)
valid = pte_content >> 7 & 0b01
print 'valid %d'%valid
pfn = pte_content & 0b01111111
print 'pfn 0x%08x'%(pfn)

index = (va & 0b11111)

value = 0
if valid == 1:
value = mem[pfn][index]
elif pfn != 0x7f:
value = disk[pfn][index]
else:
continue

pa = (pfn << 5) | index
print 'To Physical Address 0x%08x'%(pfn)
print 'Value: 0x%02x'%value

code:

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

const int va[5] = {0x6653,0x1c13,0x6890,0x0af6,0x1e6f};
const int init_page = 0x6c;

unsigned mem[0x80][0x20], disk[0x80][0x20];

void solve(int va)
{
printf("Virtual Address %04x:\n", va);
int idx = va>>10;
int ctx = mem[init_page][idx];
printf(" -->pde index:0x%02x pde contents:(valid %d, pfn %02x)\n", idx, (ctx>>7), (ctx&127));
if ((ctx>>7)==0)
{
printf(" -->Fault (page directory entry not valid)\n");
return;
}
idx = ((va>>5)&31);
ctx = mem[ctx&127][idx];
printf(" -->pte index:0x%02x pte contents:(valid %d, pt %02x)\n", idx, (ctx>>7), (ctx&127));
if (ctx>>7)
{
idx = (va&31);
int add = ((ctx&127)<<5)+idx;
printf(" -->To Physical Address 0x%03x --> Value: %02x\n", add, mem[ctx&127][idx]);
return;
}
if ((ctx&127) != 0x7f)
{
idx = (va&31);
int add = ((ctx&127)<<5)+idx;
printf(" -->To Disk Sector Address 0x%03x --> Value: %02x\n", add, disk[ctx&127][idx]);
return;
}
printf(" -->To Disk Sector Page 0x7f, Fatal.\n");
}

void read_page(int x, int y)
{
char ch;
for (int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
scanf("%c", &ch);
for (int i = 0x00; i < 0x20; ++i)
{
scanf("%c", &ch);//cout << ch;
scanf("%c", &ch);//cout << ch;
unsigned tmp = (ch<='9'?ch-'0':ch-'a'+10);
scanf("%c", &ch);//cout << ch;
//mem[i] = tmp * 16 + (ch<='9'?ch-'0':ch-'a'+10);cout << mem[i] << endl;
tmp = tmp * 16 + (ch<='9'?ch-'0':ch-'a'+10);
//cout << tmp << endl;
if (y == 0)
mem[x][i] = tmp;
else
disk[x][i] = tmp;
}
while (ch != '\n')scanf("%c", &ch);//cout << ch << "end" << endl;
}

void mem_init()
{
freopen("a.txt", "r", stdin);
for (int i = 0x00; i < 0x80; ++i)
read_page(i, 0);
for (int i = 0x00; i < 0x80; ++i)
read_page(i, 1);
}

int main()
{
mem_init();
//cout << mem[0][0] << endl;
for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
solve(va[i]);
return 0;
}
